SELECT s.id, o.name, s.description, c.name costcenter FROM pb2_ext_res_section s left join pb2_ext_res_org o on s.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN pb2_ext_res_costcenter c on s.costcenter_id = c.id WHERE 1=1
concat(o.name, ' ', s.description, ' ', c.name) ILIKE '%'||#{item}||'%'
ORDER BY o.name, s.name, c.name
select *,id section_id from pb2_ext_res_section where id=#{id}

select w.name warehouse, p.id as picking_type_id, p.name as picking_type_name from pb2_ext_res_section s join pb2_ext_res_org o on s.org_id = o.id join pb2_ext_stock_warehouse w on o.operating_unit_id = w.operating_unit_id join pb2_ext_stock_picking_type p on p.id = w.in_type_id where s.id = #{id}
